players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I investigated Diana last night and discovered she is the mafioso. We must vote for her to protect the town."
Diana: "I don't believe Bob for a second. He's probably the mafioso trying to shift blame onto me!"
Bob: "Diana is the mafioso based on my investigation. We must vote her out to protect the town."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
